caption.p: Effect of marjoram essential oil (EO), chitosan, and ascorbic acid (AA) on fresh-cut lettuce on ( A) L* value, ( B) a* (greenness) (positive values), ( C) b* (yellowness), ( D) chroma, ( E) color index (positive values), ( F) hue (positive values), ( G) browning index, and ( H) whiteness index after treatment and 6 days of storage at 7 °C and 90% RH. On the columns, significant differences ( p < 0.05) among treatments are indicated by different Latin letters; ns indicates no significant differences for different days. Values represent means (±SE) of measurements made on three biological replicates per treatment.
